byline.contributor: Jane Perlez contributed reporting from Beijing.

abstract: IBM's partnership with Chinese technology company Teamsun is running afoul of political and trade issues; partnership, granted permission under US export laws, is intended to help China develop full supply chain of computers that will eventually free its dependence on American products; IBM has clashed with Obama administration's push to get China to drop measures requiring American companies to hand over technology in exchange for market access.
lead_paragraph: IBM’s partnership with Teamsun, a Beijing company, to provide key technologies is similar to ones it has made elsewhere, but it has collided with political and trade issues.

headline.main: IBM Venture With China Stirs Concerns
headline.print_headline: IBM Venture With Chinese Stirs Concern

snippet: IBM’s partnership with Teamsun, a Beijing company, to provide key technologies is similar to ones it has made elsewhere, but it has collided with political and trade issues.
